full_text: Page 474 Jeffrey Epstein From (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) To (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @pbs.org Date 2019/08/14 07:45 Subject: Jeffrey Epstein Attachments: TEXT.htm Good morning (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) I am an attorney for the Federal Bureau of Prisons assisting in the investigation of the death of the above-referenced former inmate. I understand from the U.S. Attorney's Office in the Southern District of New York that you may be able to put me in touch with someone who can produce the prison records of Mr. Epstein from his time incarcerated in Florida. Please advise what you need from my office to obtain those records. Please feel free to call me for further information or clarification. Thank you for your time. Best regards, (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Supervisory Staff Attorney CLC New York Metropolitan Correctional Center 150 Park Row New York, New York 10007 p: (646)836-(b)(6); (b)(7)(C) f: (646)836-7665 Page 1291 DOJ-OGR-00024933

text_blocks.content: Jeffrey Epstein From (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) To (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @pbs.org Date 2019/08/14 07:45 Subject: Jeffrey Epstein Attachments: TEXT.htm

Good morning (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) I am an attorney for the Federal Bureau of Prisons assisting in the investigation of the death of the above-referenced former inmate. I understand from the U.S. Attorney's Office in the Southern District of New York that you may be able to put me in touch with someone who can produce the prison records of Mr. Epstein from his time incarcerated in Florida. Please advise what you need from my office to obtain those records. Please feel free to call me for further information or clarification. Thank you for your time.

Best regards, (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Supervisory Staff Attorney CLC New York Metropolitan Correctional Center 150 Park Row New York, New York 10007 p: (646)836-(b)(6); (b)(7)(C) f: (646)836-7665

additional_notes: The document contains multiple redactions, indicated by (b)(6); (b)(7)(C), suggesting sensitive information has been withheld.
